NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Employee Relations and Skills Gap or the cell corresponding to Performance and Training Hours?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Performance} and {Training Hours} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to HR Tech and Training Hours or the cell corresponding to Recruitment and Wellbeing?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Recruitment} and {Wellbeing} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Compensation and Satisfaction or the cell corresponding to Workplace Safety and Turnover?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Workplace Safety} and {Turnover} has a higher heat value.
